tasks.task: Participate in a briefing on regenerative agriculture and policy recommendations.
subtasks: Learn about regenerative agriculture principles and practices.
Understand the policy recommendations for supporting regenerative agriculture.
Highlight the importance of regional and indigenous knowledge in regenerative agriculture.
Discuss the role of climate-smart conservation practices in federal crop insurance.
Explore the challenges and solutions for developing regional infrastructure in regenerative agriculture.
Examine the impact of climate change on regenerative agriculture practices and infrastructure.
Consider the role of indigenous and first-generation farmers in regenerative agriculture.
Reflect on integrating regenerative agriculture practices across diverse climates and agricultural systems.
